data.actual_result: You cannot open their profile, which means you need to mention them to get the profile modal open.
data.expected_result: Although invisible, the profile modal opens normally.
data.short_description: Users with invisible unicode characters and no nickname cannot be clicked in the chat area (compact mode)
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable compact mode. - Find a user with an invisible username and no nickname. - Try to click the area where their username would be shown.
